definition: red coral/precious coral (Corallium rubrum and several related species of marine coral)
precious coral/red coral (Corallium rubrum and several related species of marine coral)

sentences.english: Island group from the volcanic island and cays .
sentences.chinese: 島羣由火山島和珊瑚礁組成。

sentences.english: Others are merely accumulations of coral and skeletal debris.
sentences.chinese: 另一些則僅僅是珊瑚和骸骨碎片的堆積。

sentences.english: And Hainan's mangrove, rich coral reef are also well-known attractions.
sentences.chinese: 此外，海南的紅樹林，豐富的珊瑚礁也是著名的景色。

sentences.english: The prescription given by the doctor contains the traditional Chinese medicine Sarcandra Glabra .
sentences.chinese: 醫生開的藥方裏，包括草珊瑚這味中藥。

sentences.english: She is being hailed as a healthy red coral jewelry.
sentences.chinese: 她就是被人們譽爲健康珠寶的紅珊瑚。

sentences.english: Surrender to shine with this shimmering coral-pink.
sentences.chinese: 我願臣服在妳的珠光珊瑚色裙襬下。

sentences.english: The incoming tides were bathing the coral reef.
"It is delightful here in winter! " said the little maiden. And all the trees were covered with hoar-frost;
sentences.chinese: 於是所有的樹上全蓋滿了白霜，看起來像白色的珊瑚。

sentences.english: A diver explores wire coral in Japan's Suruga Bay.
sentences.chinese: 一位潛水者探險鐵絲珊瑚在日本的Suruga灣。

sentences.english: Coral are found in water with a depth of less than 60 meters.
sentences.chinese: 珊瑚常可在水深不超過60米的水裏找到。

sentences.english: As a boy, Cousteau loved the coral reefs in the sea.
sentences.chinese: 小的時侯，庫克斯熱愛家附近的海里的珊瑚礁。

sentences.english: Food for sponges, tridacnas and sea squirts.
sentences.chinese: 促進珊瑚的生長與在海洋裏一樣。

sentences.english: When coral bleaches, seaweed can grow out of control, stifling reef recovery.
sentences.chinese: 珊瑚白化以後，海草便不受控制的瘋長起來。

sentences.english: Tourism and copra production are the leading industries of the island.
sentences.chinese: 島上最主要的產業是旅遊業和珊瑚製品加工業。

sentences.english: The scuba diver submerged and swarm toward a coral reef.
sentences.chinese: 戴着呼吸器的潛水員潛入水底，朝珊瑚礁遊了過去。

sentences.english: "Reefs that were there for hundreds or thousands of years disappeared in a matter of about a decade, " Kleypas said.
sentences.chinese: 成千上萬年形成的珊瑚礁在大約十年之內就消失了。

definition: shell/conch/cowry/mother of pearl/hard outer skin/also pr. [bei4 qiao4]
red coral/precious coral (Corallium rubrum and several related species of marine coral)
shallow sea/sea less than 200 meters deep
